definitions.title: vb. tear away, seize
definitions.body: , rob (NH id., Ph. [[גזל]] Niph., Aram. [[גְּוַל]], glaz & (Nas.) gzal; Ar. jazala cut off)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[גׇּזַל]] Job 20:19, Ez Eze 18:18, [[גׇּזׇ֑ל]] Le 5:23 +2 t., [[גׇּוַלְתִּי]] Ps 69:5 etc.; Impf.  [[יִגְזׁל]] Ez Eze 18:7, [[וַיִּגְזׁל]] 2Sa 23:21, 1Ch 11:23 etc.; Inf. [[גְּזׁל]] Is 10:2; Pt. act. [[גּוֹזֵל]] Pr 28:24; sf. [[גּׁזְלוֹ]] Ps 35:10; pl. cstr. [[גּׁזְלֵי]] Mic 3:2; pass. [[גׇּזוּל]] De 28:29 + 4 t.;—tear away, rob, c. obj. rei (movable), flock ([[עֵדֶר]]) Job 24:2, ass De 28:31, women Ju Jdg 21:23 cf. Ge 31:31 (E), tear away orphan child from breast Job 24:9 [[יתום מִשּׁׂד]], snatch a spear from enemy's hand 2Sa 23:21 = 1Ch 11:23; fig. of drying up snow-water Job 24:19; (obj. stationary) take violent possession of, well of water Ge 21:25 (E), house Job 20:19, fields Mic 2:2; (hyperb.) the skin Mic 3:2; c. acc. cogn. = seize, plunder, obj. [[גְּזֵלָה]] Le 5:23 (P) Ez Eze 18:7, Eze 18:12, Eze 18:16, [[גׇּזֵל]] Ez Eze 18:18, Eze 22:29; indef. Ps 69:5; fig., obj. [[מִשְׁפָּט]] Is 10:2; c. obj. pers. robbed Ps 35:10, Pr 22:22, Pr 28:24, prob. also Ju Jdg 9:25 cf. Le 19:13 (H; abs.); cf. also pass. De 28:29 (‖[[עָשׁוּק]]); [[החיל גׇּזוּל מיד עושׁק]] Je 21:12 cf. Je 22:3; Mal 1:13 [[גׇּזוּל]] (‖[[פִּסֵּחַ]] lame and [[חוֹלֶה]] sick), prob. that rescued after seizure by wild beasts, therefore mutilated. †
